name: Microstructure
description: An entity describing some general aspects of a microstructure.

properties.name: grainsize
properties.description: Average grain size, corresponding to the radius of a sphere of the same volume as the average grain.

properties.name: delta
properties.description: Average subgrain size, corresponding to the radius of a sphere of the same volume as the average subgrain.

properties.name: theta
properties.description: Average misorientation between low-angle grain boundaries.

properties.name: phi
properties.description: Average misorientation between high-angle grain boundaries.
